mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_acm ORDER BY liked_count DESC LIMIT 9
SELECT * FROM tbl_acm ORDER BY liked_count DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT DISTINCT a.* FROM tbl_acm a LEFT JOIN tbl_reservations r ON a.acm_id = r.acm_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND a.acm_location like #{acmLocation}
AND ( a.max_guest BETWEEN #{maxGuests} - 1 AND #{maxGuests} + 1 OR #{maxGuests} BETWEEN a.max_guest - 1 AND a.max_guest + 1 )
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_reservations r2 WHERE r2.acm_id = a.acm_id AND ( (r2.check_in <= #{checkOutDate} AND r2.check_out >= #{checkInDate}) OR (r2.check_in BETWEEN #{checkInDate} AND #{checkOutDate}) OR (r2.check_out BETWEEN #{checkInDate} AND #{checkOutDate}) ) )
ORDER BY CASE WHEN a.max_guest = #{maxGuests} THEN 0 ELSE ABS(a.max_guest - #{maxGuests}) END, a.liked_count DESC LIMIT 9
